name: v2.0473
title: v2 Formulary status
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0473 ( Formulary status)

concept.display: This observation/service is on the formulary, and has guidelines

designation.value: Deze test/service zit in het formularium en er zijn richtlijnen

concept.display: This observation/service is not on the formulary

designation.value: Deze test/service zit niet in het formularium

concept.display: This observation/service is on the formulary, but is restricted

designation.value: Deze test/service zit in het formularium maar er gelden beperkingen

concept.display: This observation/service is on the formulary

designation.value: Deze test/service zit in het formularium
